import re

def convert_string_to_list(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = cleaned_string.split()
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    sorted_words = sorted(unique_words)
    return sorted_words

import re

def convert_string_to_list(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    words = cleaned_string.split()
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    sorted_words = sorted(unique_words)
    return sorted_words
